Hi {!Contact.FirstName},
Technology may be intimidating to the HR professional who has spent years learning the ropes to deliver quality candidates that meet a variety of requirements. But whether you are new to your role or a seasoned professional, attend this HR.com + PGi webinar, The Virtual Handshake: How to Combine the Latest Technology with Classic Recruiting Principles, for best practices and real-life advice on:
• How to open doors to connect with great candidates that are hard to reach
• Tips and lessons learned from one-on-one virtual interviews
• How to “flip the funnel” with candidates
Register now, it's free! The Virtual Handshake: How to Combine the Latest Technology with Classic Recruiting Principles March 19, 2014 1pm Eastern Time Click here to register: http://www.hr.com/stories/1390847684933
Sincerely, {!User.FirstName} {!User.LastName} {!User.Title} {!User.Email} {!User.Phone}
P.S. If you are not the correct person to speak to about recruiting tools for talent acquisition within your organization, it would be great if you would direct me to the correct individual. Thanks in advance for your help!
